azurerm_storage_share_directory.description: Manages a Directory within an Azure Storage File Share.

share_name.description: The name of the File Share where this Directory should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

storage_account_name.description: The name of the Storage Account within which the File Share is located. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

metadata.description: A mapping of metadata to assign to this Directory.

id.description: The ID of the Directory within the File Share.

create.description: Used when creating the Storage Share Directory.

update.description: Used when updating the Storage Share Directory.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Storage Share Directory.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Storage Share Directory.
